description: Programme Conjoint d'Appui à la Consolidation de la Paix et à la Gouvernance au Burundi

subproject.description: Les cadres et institutions démocratiques aux niveaux national,provincial, local et décentralisé sont renforcés en vue de la consolidation d’une participation politique inclusive, de la réconciliation nationale et de la redevabilité/ imputablité
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: P&G Integrated Unit (CORE)

subproject.description:
Development of a national roster of decentralization actors detailing their roles at commune and province levels

Establishment of a national association of local elected officials as well as a national committee of women local elected officials

Creation of a national civil registry database and records maintained at commune level by 129 specialized civil servants trained in archive management 

Development and nationwide distribution of a handbook detailing the role and responsibilities of municipal counselors and civil servants in French and Kirundi

Establishment of a national network of civil society organizations working in the area of decentralization

Construction of municipal offices in 5 of the 129 communes nationwide in which they do not exist

Rehabilitation of remaining 15 out of 77 municipal offices nationwide classified as unsuitable by a Ministry of Interior survey validated by all stakeholders 

3,225 elected municipal counselors and 3,000 other local elected officials trained in municipal management and accountability

Provision of computers and other equipment to 34 municipal offices
subproject.title: Local Public Services - PBF

title: Peace & Governance Joint Programme
